channel.title: Custom crown problem
channel.description:
Hey guys
I just added a custom crown, And i have a tricky problem
The thing i did: i editted a crown into the owner crown, and i changed the @cr2@ go @cr3@ but... I cant see the crown, other players can, but i cant... Any ideas?
~Aaron
